data.name: Angels of Death: A sinner has no right of choice.
data.short_description: The door to Floor B3 opens to reveal a space like a prison cell, enclosed by pure white walls and iron bars. The moment Zack strikes the locked door before them with his scythe, the duo are barraged by machine gun fire.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
